column1: Uchi////Not that impressed by the sushi here. There's def better options for sushi in Houston. I got the shag roll and it was pretty small
column2: not that flavorful either. Our table ordered the shishito pepper and our mouth was on fire!!! They told us it's the season-- they're a bit spicier than usual
column3: but wow...we wanted to ask for glasses of milk. The ambiance was really nice though
column4: loved the vibe. They gave us free dessert and it was decadent (not sure what it's called though).
